name: Xriba
description: Xriba is the first protocol to add transparency to corporate cash flows, making them available on the public Blockchain. The Xriba (XRA) protocol is a decentralized financial application built and developed to enhance the financial transparency of todayâ€™s wave of cryptocurrency companies. Xriba operates by recording financial transaction records on a public Blockchain with the vision of increasing stability, improving the quality of the automated reports and providing accountability power for the open market. Xriba has developed a protocol, accounting applications and various tool- sets to address the ambiguity in evaluating cryptocurrency companies from a financial perspective
